sentences.english: We need AB blood donors urgently because a patient's life is at stake.
sentences.chinese: 我們急需AB型捐血人，因爲有一名病人的性命垂危。

sentences.english: They conclude that it is illegal for doctors to help the dying end their lives.
sentences.chinese: 他們的結論是，醫生幫助垂危病人結束生命是違法的。

sentences.english: For some time after his dangerous operation, Keren's life hang by a thread.
sentences.chinese: 在手術後的一段時間，凱倫的生命都處於垂危之中。

sentences.english: Her life now hangs by a thread.
There may be no turning back for life-limiting illnesses.
sentences.chinese: 生命垂危的重病有可能不能轉危爲安了。

sentences.english: She was so far gone when the doctor arrived.
sentences.chinese: 醫生到達時她已生命垂危。

sentences.english: The boy cycling in the street was knocked down by a minibus and received fatal injuries.
sentences.chinese: 在街上騎車的男孩被一輛小型客車撞到，生命垂危。

sentences.english: There I am on my deathbed dying of cancer, growing weaker and weaker.
sentences.chinese: 想象我因爲癌症垂危病牀，慢慢變得愈發虛弱。

sentences.english: Provincial authorities add 32 of the 49 injured are in critical conditions.
sentences.chinese: 省政府補充說，其中32人生命垂危。

sentences.english: My friend is in danger of losing his life.
They attended day and night on the dying man.
sentences.chinese: 他們日夜照顧那個生命垂危的人。

sentences.english: The desert deserves the nervous servhelpless ould likes to obaloneyerve.
sentences.chinese: 那個沙漠值得神經垂危的公務員們去觀察。

sentences.english: She cared for her father in his dying years.
sentences.chinese: 她在父親生命垂危的數年裏一直照料他。

sentences.english: Kong Mei in running the snake bite, coma, in critical condition.
sentences.chinese: 孔梅在奔跑中被毒蛇咬中，陷入昏迷，生命垂危。

sentences.english: The motorcyclist was in a critical condition in hospital last night.
sentences.chinese: 那位摩托車手昨晚在醫院生命垂危。

definition: to be critically ill/to be terminally ill
in imminent peril (idiom)/on the brink of crisis
nearing death/on the point of demise/approaching extinction
vitally important/a matter of life and death
to checkmate (in chess)/to be about to die
on one's deathbed/at the point of death
